title: Sales Development Representative [Outbound]
job_overview:
We are looking for a Sales Development Representative to join our team! You will:

- Call potential clients from our leads list
- Qualify prospects and schedule discovery calls with our team
- Work US hours (CST)

Pay: PHP20,000-PHP40,000 (Competitive hourly rate + commissions for each closed deal)

Requirements:

- Strong communication skills in English
- Experience in cold calling or sales outreach
- Reliable internet connection, backup, headset and computer
- Ability to follow processes and meet targets

If you want to grow in a remote sales role, fill out this form to be shortlisted:
Upgrade to see actual info

Want to know more? Dive in at Upgrade to see actual info!
